content: CU 2-12 USB charging adapter USB charging adapter for Hilti 12V batteries to charge tablets, phones and other devices with USB-C or USB-A ports ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Jobsite essentials ### FEATURES:Features Make any 12V battery a power bank – with this adapter, your 4 Ah batteries can be used to fully recharge an average smartphone 2-3 times A power bank built for real jobsite conditions – compact size, durable housing and belt hook so you can easily charge your phone on the go Future-proof design – includes both USB-A and USB-C ports for use with the very latest mobile devices Flashlight function – built-in LED light to turn your 12V battery into a convenient flashlight Applications Adapter enabling any Hilti 12V battery to charge USB devices ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2369222 - USB charging adapter CU 2-12 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CU 2-12 USB charging adapter
